title: Is there any technology that makes some electronic devices need no batteries? - Quora

response.answer_text: Yes. See e.g. Energy harvesting - Wikipedia Energy can be harvested from magnetic fields and radio waves - that’s how an RFID tag works, e.g. a dog ID chip. There are devices now (2010’s) that can collect energy from single solar cells (0.6V), or potentially from random gusts of wind, and boost it to a workable voltage (e.g. 3V).
